title: Flat Model (Flaches Modell)
provenance:
Estate of Magda Mautner;
Hertha Jaeger, member of the family of Magda Mautner von Markhof
description: Flat, rectangular in form, handle tapering very slightly towards head; four tines, the head with very, very slight cupping shape; four hollow beads attached at bottom edge of handle.
name: Fork
